name: Mihir Jain
text: Hey! I am also not too good with video games, I platinumed ds1 and ds2 but I did it with help of a lot of people so I reached for help with this game too and it made it a lot more enjoyable. I hope you you decide to do a second playthough where you might get more enjoyment out of the game! I loved this game a lot and wait was well worth it!
